meanings.definition: A person or thing that creates an outline.
meanings.sent1: The outliner drew a simple plan for the project.
meanings.sent2: I used an outliner to organize my ideas for the essay.
meanings.sent3: The outliner robot made a blueprint for the new building.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an outliner, neatly arranging thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The outliner's role is crucial in structuring the story.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used to create outlines.
meanings.sent1: I opened the outliner on my computer to map out the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The outliner program helped me organize my research notes.
meanings.sent3: The outliner app made outlining so much easier for students.
meanings.sent4: The outliner tool acted like a digital assistant for planning.
meanings.sent5: Using the outliner software improved my writing process.

meanings.sent1: The outliner of the meeting highlighted the key points.
meanings.sent2: I quickly jotted down an outliner of the chapter for reference.
meanings.sent3: The outliner of the movie was just a few sentences long.
meanings.sent4: His outliner for the trip was detailed and well-organized.
meanings.sent5: Creating an outliner before writing helps in structuring thoughts.
